title: United Forces
description: Combine data from multiple sources using UNION to create a single unified result set.
story: The city has two separate databases: current_residents and new_applicants. Combine them into a single list using UNION.
hint: UNION combines results from two SELECT statements, removing duplicates. Use UNION ALL to keep duplicates. Both queries must have the same number and type of columns.
tableSetup: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS new_applicants CASCADE;
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS current_residents CASCADE;
CREATE TABLE current_residents (name VARCHAR(100), age INT, status VARCHAR(50));
CREATE TABLE new_applicants (name VARCHAR(100), age INT, status VARCHAR(50));
